name: USAFE
overview:
Using principles developed by Nicola Tesla we have over-come the plasma escape problems with atomic fusion in a prototype unit.

Investigating the Tesla principle that looked promising our first two experimental sessions resulted in an accidental vaporization of tungsten targets in eleven seconds PLUS a huge radiation and magnetic release each time that completely erased all video cameras within a four foot radius from the unit. Input to the unit was a mere 200 watts. Video JVC tape within one camera with previously taken recordings was completely erased (huge magnetic output indicated by this), and a digital camera was erased and its memory permanently damaged to the extent of 10% (possible radiation release - X-ray or gamma). Since first sessions were just to investigate potentials for plasma containment the apparent fusion reaction was a total surprise. Physicists, engineers, and funding needed for further follow-up. As I understand it the potential is huge since I heard that 1/2 glass of water could power a city like New York for six months.
